header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: social networking, social relationships, communication strategies,learning materials and development of moving images case studies for educational purposes.
header.activity: A couple brainstorming ideas for a small business in the education sector.
header.conv_type: Discussing, explaining, inquiring, advising, requesting, anecdote telling

speaker.fls: French -- level unspecified; German -- level unspecified
